bibl.title: Letter from J.E. Harper to Henry Rose Carter, February 11, 1916

div1.p: Harper grants Carter a leave of absence.

div1.head: Letter from J.E. Harper to Henry Rose Carter, February 11, 1916
div1.opener:
DIVISION OF APPOINTMENTS
NGE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY
WASHINGTON
February 11, 1916.
Assistant Surgeon General H. R. Carter,
Public Health Service,
Baltimore, Maryland.
Sir:
div1.p:
By direction of the Secretary, and as recommended by the
Surgeon-General on the 9th instant, you are hereby granted
leave of absence for a period of three months and twenty-six
days, beginning March 1, 1916, with permission to go beyond
the seas.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, J E Harper
Chief, Division of Appointments. JKB
